interface.name: acct_domtrans
interface.summary: Transition to the accounting management domain.

interface.name: acct_exec
interface.summary: Execute accounting management tools in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: acct_exec_data
interface.summary: Execute accounting management data in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: acct_manage_data
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete process accounting data.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
